about_the_game:
The "House In The Hollow," is a first-person adventure game that combines horror, the occult, and magic to create a truly immersive and thrilling experience.

As the player, you will assume the role of Aloysius Abadier, a man compelled to unravel the century-old mystery of the disappearance of the infamous occultist Francis Barrett.

Your journey will take you to a remote, forgotten forest, where you'll discover a dark and twisted world filled with occult rituals, ancient artifacts, and powerful magic. As you explore the abandoned Manor House, you'll uncover hidden secrets, ancient artifacts, and powerful spells. But beware, there are dark forces at work that will stop at nothing to keep their secrets hidden and prevent your escape.

The game features a unique blend of first-person exploration, puzzle-solving, and discovery as you use your occult knowledge and determination to unravel the mystery and escape the hollow.

STORY -


Francis Barrett was an English magician and occultist who led a reclusive life, spending most of his time in an isolated manor house.

Nestled in a hollow and surrounded by a dense forest, the house was hidden from the world.

Little is known about Francis Barrett beyond his authorship of The Magus, a Celestial intelligencer and compendium of occult and magical information.

Over the many years since Francis Barrett disappeared, people have attempted, without success, to find the mysterious house and discover what happened to Mr. Barrett.

No one can be sure what experiments Francis Barrett performed, or what was conjured up, in that house.

Some who have gone searching for the house have never returned.

FEATURES -


Embark on an unforgettable journey and explore the hollow like never before, with a first-person view that immerses you in a world of realistic environments.

But beware, progress won't come easy as you'll need to engage in problem-solving and exploration to unravel the deep mystery that surrounds the hollow.



To create a lifelike game world, physics are incorporated for cloth and interior fittings and fixtures, which will make you feel as if you are truly a part of the environment.

As you navigate the world, environmental and asset particle effects add to the realism, making every detail feel accurate and true-to-life, including full wind animation that makes every leaf and branch appear natural and lifelike.



For further immersion, multi-layered texturing with physically based rendered materials are used to create a world that looks and feels realistic in every way.

And the game's advanced visuals, including light shafts, temporal anti-aliasing, and tone mapping, create a seamless and cinematic experience.



With its combination of unique locations and Art Deco designs, advanced color correction, ambient occlusion, and real-time raytracing, the House In The Hollow offers a rich, immersive experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 / AMD RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommend
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 4070 / AMD RX 6900
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommend

short_description: With graphics inspired by the 1920's Art Deco period, and a chilling soundtrack, the "House In The Hollow" will take you on a journey like no other. A journey filled with mystery, horror, and magic, where you are the master of your own fate.
